title: The Queen's Confession (Hist Fict)-Victoria Holt AZW3 EPUB MOBI
description:
The Queen's Confession: The Story of Marie-Antoinette (Historical Fiction) â€” Victoria Holt. Formats: AZW3, EPUB, MOBI. First published in 1968.

Fiction. Tags: France, History, Romance, Royalty
isbn:9780449212295 

The unforgettable story of Marie Antoinette, from her pampered childhood in imperial Vienna, to the luxury and splendor of her days as Queen of France, to her dramatic experiences of the Revolution ...

Victoria Holt has recreated the life of Marie Antoinette through actual letters and memoirs, to produce this fictional autobiography of the Queen of France. Although the history is accurate, the finer details are almost certainly fiction.

I have added a glossary and a few images that were not in the 1968 edition
